# Arrogance Killing

The Arrogance reduces their kill cooldown with each successful kill of theirs.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Arrogance that can be in a match
  • Starting kill cooldown
    • Set the starting Kill Cooldown of the Arrogance
  • Reduce kill cooldown by
    • Set how much the Arrogances Kill Cooldown depletes by after successful kills
  • Minimum kill cooldown
    • Set how low the Arrogances Kill Cooldown can possibly be
  • (Hidden Role) Bard - Has a % Chance of replacing Arrogance.

Bard

From: TOU & Coding: KARPED1EMopen in new windowopen in new window
